title: Update zinux framework

help.detail: Update zinux framework with its online repository.

options.$branch_name: Specify which branch do you want to update.
options.--cache:
Update cached zinux directory.
(This will cause every project you create be updated.)
options.--simulate:
Simulate the updating process.
(Nothing actually changes during simulation.)

notes: In order to use this command, there must be git installed.
